overview:
Raj is a Software Engineer at Cisco Systems developing Mac OSX applications for Cisco’s Unified Communications Business Unit. Previously, Raj received a BS degree in Electrical Engineering at the University of Southern California, Los Angeles. Apart from Engineering Raj is interested in Business development and startups and ended up spending most of his Senior year taking entrepreneurship , finance and strategy classes at the Marshall School of Business.

Currently Raj is working on taking the dive and becoming a passionate entrepreneur. In the meantime he enjoys talking to entrepreneurs and attending events such as Startup School, WWDC, Macworld, VLAB events at Stanford. He is also trying to become a better hacker.

Raj grew up in Kolkata and was extremely passionate about Cricket. Today, he lives and works in the beautiful Bay Area.
